CN: 打出后抽 [Arg1] 张牌。
EN: When you play the engraved card, draw [Arg1] card.

CN: 打出后获得 [Arg1] 点算力。
EN: When you play the engraved card, recover [Arg1] Arithmetica.

CN: 打出后所属唤醒体获得 [Arg1] 点狂气。
EN: When you play the engraved card, increase its Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>.

CN: 打出后<VulnerabilityIconKeywords:易伤>所有敌人 [Arg1] 回合。
EN: When you play the engraved card, inflict [Arg1] turn of <VulnerabilityIconKeywords:Vulnerable> on all enemies.

CN: 打出后<WeaknessIconKeywords:虚弱>所有敌人 [Arg1] 回合。
EN: When you play the engraved card, inflict [Arg1] turn of <WeaknessIconKeywords:Weakness> on all enemies.

CN: 打出后获得 [Arg1] 点护盾。
EN: When you play the engraved card, gain <Block:[Arg1]> Shield.

CN: 打出后额外生效 [Arg1] 次，获得 [Arg2] 点黑印，<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>、<GuyouKeywords:固有>。
EN: The engraved card has <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust> and <GuyouKeywords:Innate>. When you play the engraved card, it takes effect [Arg1] extra time, and you receive [Arg2] Black Sigils.

CN: 战斗开始后将 [Arg1] 张临时复制洗入抽牌堆，原始卡牌和镜像卡牌均获得<RetainIconKeywords:保留>。
EN: At the start of each battle, shuffle [Arg1] basic copy of the engraved card into the Draw Pile. Both the engraved card and the copy it creates have <RetainIconKeywords:Retain>.

CN: 打出后获得 [Arg1] 层<RetaliateIconKeywords:反击>，对所有敌人造成 [Arg2]% <RetaliateIconKeywords:反击>的真实伤害。
EN: When you play the engraved card, gain [Arg1] <RetaliateIconKeywords:Counter>, then deal True DMG to all enemies equal to [Arg2]% of your <RetaliateIconKeywords:Counter>.

CN: 打出后对所有敌人施加 [Arg1] 层<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>，使所有敌人触发 [Arg2]% <IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒> 。
EN: When you play the engraved card, inflict [Arg1] <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> on all enemies, then trigger [Arg2]% of each enemy's <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison>.

CN: 打出后使 1 条触腕攻击 [Arg1] 次。
EN: When you play the engraved card, trigger [Arg1] Tentacle attack.

CN: 打出后 <EmbryoFusionIconKeywords:胚胎融合>  +[Arg1]%。
EN: When you play the engraved card, increase <EmbryoFusionIconKeywords:Embryo Fusion> by +[Arg1]%.

CN: 打出后将卡牌的 [Arg1] 张复制加入临时<DimensionalSpaceIconKeywords:超维空间>。
EN: When you play the engraved card, add [Arg1] copy of it to a Temporary <DimensionalSpaceIconKeywords:Ultra Space> slot.

CN: 打出后获得 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: When you play the engraved card, gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR> after its effects resolve.

CN: 打出后获得 [Arg1] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，刻印卡牌也能受到该<PowerIconKeywords:力量>加成。
EN: When you play the engraved card, first gain [Arg1] Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR>, then resolve the card's effects.

CN: 打出后其他唤醒体获得 [Arg1] 狂气。
EN: When you play the engraved card, increase all other Awakeners' Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>.

CN: 打出后将 [Arg1] 张 <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:「灵感」> 洗入抽牌堆。「灵感-获得 1 算力。抽 1 张牌，<RetainIconKeywords:保留>，<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>。」
EN: When you play the engraved card, shuffle [Arg1] <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight"> into the Draw Pile.

CN: 打出后使所有敌人失去 [Arg1] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: When you play the engraved card, inflict [Arg1] Temp. <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR▼> on all enemies.

EN: All cards are already engraved.

EN: Choose two cards to Engrave

EN: Engrave

EN: Choose a card to Engrave

CN: 确定刻印此卡
EN: Engrave this card

EN: Choose an Engraved card to enhance its Orison

CN: 选择 3 张指令卡赋予「合奏」刻印。
EN: Choose 3 Command cards to engrave the "Ensemble" Orison.
